settings.title: Welcome!
settings.text: If you're reading this right now you're likely a packet about to start a journey across the internet. At the moment you've been sent out through a device and are sitting in your first router. Routers look at your destination address and depending on the local traffic conditions will pass you through to the next closest stop along your journey to your destination.
To determine your destination IP address, first locate your ISP's DNS resolver. Make sure you have the domain name of your destination ready for faster processing.
